Uses of Class
org.jamwiki.model.Namespace

  • Packages that use Namespace 
    Package Description
    org.jamwiki.db
    Provides classes needed for all database interaction.
    org.jamwiki.model
    Provides basic objects for use on the Wiki, including WikiUser, Topic, TopicVersion, etc.
    org.jamwiki.parser
    The org.jamwiki.parser package contains the interfaces, abstract classes, and utility classes needed to implement a parser for JAMWiki.
    org.jamwiki.utils
    Provides various general utility classes including encryption, caching, and logging.

    • Uses of Namespace in org.jamwiki.db

      Methods in org.jamwiki.db that return Namespace 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Namespace AnsiDataHandler.lookupNamespace(String virtualWiki, String namespaceString)
      Given a namespace string, return the namespace that corresponds to that string, or null if no match exists.
      Namespace AnsiDataHandler.lookupNamespaceById(int namespaceId)
      Given a namespace ID return the corresponding namespace, or null if no match exists.
      Methods in org.jamwiki.db that return types with arguments of type Namespace 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Namespace> AnsiDataHandler.lookupNamespaces()
      Return all namespaces currently available for the wiki.
      List<Namespace> QueryHandler.lookupNamespaces(Connection conn)
      Retrieve a list of all current namespace objects.
      List<Namespace> OracleQueryHandler.lookupNamespaces(Connection conn)
      Override the parent method - Oracle treats empty strings and null the same, so this method converts empty strings to " " as a workaround.
      List<Namespace> AnsiQueryHandler.lookupNamespaces(Connection conn) 
      Methods in org.jamwiki.db with parameters of type Namespace 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Topic QueryHandler.lookupTopic(int virtualWikiId, Namespace namespace, String pageName, Connection conn)
      Retrieve a topic that matches a given name and virtual wiki.
      Topic AnsiQueryHandler.lookupTopic(int virtualWikiId, Namespace namespace, String pageName, Connection conn) 
      Topic AnsiDataHandler.lookupTopic(String virtualWiki, Namespace namespace, String pageName, boolean deleteOK)
      Retrieve a Topic object that matches the given virtual wiki, namespace and page name.
      String QueryHandler.lookupTopicName(int virtualWikiId, String virtualWikiName, Namespace namespace, String pageName)
      This method is used primarily to determine if a topic with a given name exists, taking as input a topic name and virtual wiki and returning the corresponding topic name, or null if no matching topic exists.
      String AnsiQueryHandler.lookupTopicName(int virtualWikiId, String virtualWikiName, Namespace namespace, String pageName) 
      String AnsiDataHandler.lookupTopicName(String virtualWiki, Namespace namespace, String pageName)
      This method is used primarily to determine if a topic with a given name exists, taking as input a topic name and virtual wiki and returning the corresponding topic name, or null if no matching topic exists.
      void QueryHandler.updateNamespace(Namespace namespace, Connection conn)
      Add or update a namespace.
      void OracleQueryHandler.updateNamespace(Namespace namespace, Connection conn)
      Override the parent method - Oracle treats empty strings and null the same, so this method converts empty strings to " " as a workaround.
      void AnsiQueryHandler.updateNamespace(Namespace namespace, Connection conn) 
      protected void AnsiDataValidator.validateNamespace(Namespace namespace)
      Validate that all fields of a Namespace object are valid for the database.
      protected void AnsiDataValidator.validateNamespaceTranslation(Namespace namespace, String virtualWiki)
      Validate that all fields of a namespace translation object are valid for the database.
      void AnsiDataHandler.writeNamespace(Namespace namespace)
      Add or update a namespace.

      Methods in org.jamwiki.model that return Namespace 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Namespace Namespace.findCommentsNamespace(Namespace namespace)
      Given a namespace, return the Namespace for the corresponding "comments" namespace.
      static Namespace Namespace.findMainNamespace(Namespace namespace)
      Given a namespace, return the Namespace for the "main" (ie, not comments) namespace.

      static Namespace Namespace.namespace(int namespaceId)
      Utility method for retrieving a namespace given the ID.
      static Namespace[] Namespace.retrieveDefaultNamespacesForSetup()
      Return a list of the default namespaces for use by setup.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
